preqs: Twelve credit points of first-year Arts units.

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {A6008, A6011} Do true Otherwise Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ACL1%, AEH1%, AMU1%, ASA1%, ATS1%, AZA1%}

description: The unit looks at the divide between climate science communication and the media coverage of climate change. It examines six barriers to the successful communication of climate change: the nature of climate change itself, the nature of scientific cultures, the denialist industry around the world, concentrated media ownership in Australia vs social media, the particular culture of environmental reporting in Australia, and the denaturing of experience that results from urban life.
